text: is a train station on the Nankō Port Town Line (New Tram) in Suminoe-ku, Osaka, Japan. It literally means "Port Town East". ==Layout== *There is an elevated island platform with two tracks. The station is completely walled in with glass walls. ==Adjacent stations== Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture Category:Osaka Metro stations Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1981
title: Port Town-higashi Station
